resume.skillmessage:
We work in team and we are Versatile. We both study programming in Russia. We are from Cameroon. We speak at least five languages.
	We like doing good job. Joel is the back-end specialist and he also have some knowledge in front end. 
 He has some experience in Java, Spring boot.
He studied some Kotlin, scala, Pascal,Csharp and did some project on those languages. He now has as pass time writing algorithms.
Donald is the Python Guy, He also like JavaScript and studies algorithms in Csharp. He is willing to be a machine learning engineer but for now he writes diffrent types of scripts and learn different types of technologies.
We both are React enthusiasts and are building our projects together most of the time.

education.school: Russian State Vocational and Pedagogical University: Donald
education.description: At School, we learn Java, Csharp and C++. We learn how to use AutoCad and we learn Game programming with the platform Unreal, We also learn DataBase Management and Some web development. We added some information Security module and we have some seminars on AI. I also did some Android app development during our projects
